name: EventTitle
description: This event is fired when a title is displayed on screen.
overview: Fires when any title is displayed. The `text` field contains the title content. Includes server titles and game notifications. Not cancellable. Useful for tracking important announcements.

methods.name: text
methods.description: The title text that was displayed. This contains the title text as it appeared on screen, including any Minecraft formatting codes.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
